00030 /**
00031  * \file
00032  *         Platform configuration for the Sentilla JCreate
00033  * \author
00034  *         Niclas Finne <nfi@sics.se>
00035  *         Joakim Eriksson <joakime@sics.se>
00036  */
00037 
00038 #ifndef __PLATFORM_CONF_H__
00039 #define __PLATFORM_CONF_H__
00040 
00041 /*
00042  * Definitions below are dictated by the hardware and not really
00043  * changeable!
00044  */
00045 /* Platform TMOTE_SKY */
00046 #define TMOTE_SKY 1
00047 
00048 #define LEDS_CONF_ALL     255
00049 #define PLATFORM_HAS_LEDS   1
00050 #define PLATFORM_HAS_BUTTON 0
00051 
00052 /* CPU target speed in Hz */
00053 #define F_CPU 3900000uL /*2457600uL*/
00054 
00055 /* Our clock resolution, this is the same as Unix HZ. */
00056 #define CLOCK_CONF_SECOND 128UL
00057 
00058 #define BAUD2UBR(baud) ((F_CPU/baud))
00059 
00060 #define CCIF
00061 #define CLIF
00062 
00063 #define CC_CONF_INLINE inline
00064 
00065 #define HAVE_STDINT_H
00066 #define MSP430_MEMCPY_WORKAROUND 1
00067 #include "msp430def.h"
00068 
00069 
00070 /* Types for clocks and uip_stats */
00071 typedef unsigned short uip_stats_t;
00072 typedef unsigned long clock_time_t;
00073 typedef unsigned long off_t;
00074 
00075 /* the low-level radio driver */
00076 #define NETSTACK_CONF_RADIO   cc2420_driver
00077 
00078 /* LED ports */
00079 #define LEDS_PxDIR P5DIR
00080 #define LEDS_PxOUT P5OUT
00081 #define LEDS_CONF_RED    0x10
00082 #define LEDS_CONF_GREEN  0x20
00083 #define LEDS_CONF_YELLOW 0x40
00084 
00085 /* DCO speed resynchronization for more robust UART, etc. */
00086 #ifndef DCOSYNCH_CONF_ENABLED
00087 #define DCOSYNCH_CONF_ENABLED 1
00088 #endif /* DCOSYNCH_CONF_ENABLED */
00089 #ifndef DCOSYNCH_CONF_PERIOD
00090 #define DCOSYNCH_CONF_PERIOD 30
00091 #endif /* DCOSYNCH_CONF_PERIOD */
00092 
00093 #define ROM_ERASE_UNIT_SIZE  512
00094 #define XMEM_ERASE_UNIT_SIZE (64*1024L)
00095 
00096 
00097 #define CFS_CONF_OFFSET_TYPE    long
00098 
00099 
00100 /* Use the first 64k of external flash for node configuration */
00101 #define NODE_ID_XMEM_OFFSET     (0 * XMEM_ERASE_UNIT_SIZE)
00102 
00103 /* Use the second 64k of external flash for codeprop. */
00104 #define EEPROMFS_ADDR_CODEPROP  (1 * XMEM_ERASE_UNIT_SIZE)
00105 
00106 #define CFS_XMEM_CONF_OFFSET    (2 * XMEM_ERASE_UNIT_SIZE)
00107 #define CFS_XMEM_CONF_SIZE      (1 * XMEM_ERASE_UNIT_SIZE)
00108 
00109 #define CFS_RAM_CONF_SIZE 4096
00110 
00111 /*
00112  * SPI bus configuration for the TMote Sky.
00113  */
00114 
00115 /* SPI input/output registers. */
00116 #define SPI_TXBUF U0TXBUF
00117 #define SPI_RXBUF U0RXBUF
00118 
00119                                 /* USART0 Tx ready? */
00120 #define SPI_WAITFOREOTx() while ((U0TCTL & TXEPT) == 0)
00121                                 /* USART0 Rx ready? */
00122 #define SPI_WAITFOREORx() while ((IFG1 & URXIFG0) == 0)
00123                                 /* USART0 Tx buffer ready? */
00124 #define SPI_WAITFORTxREADY() while ((IFG1 & UTXIFG0) == 0)
00125 
00126 #define SCK            1  /* P3.1 - Output: SPI Serial Clock (SCLK) */
00127 #define MOSI           2  /* P3.2 - Output: SPI Master out - slave in (MOSI) */
00128 #define MISO           3  /* P3.3 - Input:  SPI Master in - slave out (MISO) */
00129 
00130 /*
00131  * SPI bus - M25P80 external flash configuration.
00132  */
00133 
00134 #define FLASH_PWR       3       /* P4.3 Output */
00135 #define FLASH_CS        4       /* P4.4 Output */
00136 #define FLASH_HOLD      7       /* P4.7 Output */
00137 
00138 /* Enable/disable flash access to the SPI bus (active low). */
00139 
00140 #define SPI_FLASH_ENABLE()  ( P4OUT &= ~BV(FLASH_CS) )
00141 #define SPI_FLASH_DISABLE() ( P4OUT |=  BV(FLASH_CS) )
00142 
00143 #define SPI_FLASH_HOLD()                ( P4OUT &= ~BV(FLASH_HOLD) )
00144 #define SPI_FLASH_UNHOLD()              ( P4OUT |=  BV(FLASH_HOLD) )
00145 
00146 /*
00147  * SPI bus - CC2420 pin configuration.
00148  */
00149 
00150 #define CC2420_CONF_SYMBOL_LOOP_COUNT 800
00151 
00152 /* P1.0 - Input: FIFOP from CC2420 */
00153 #define CC2420_FIFOP_PORT(type)   P1##type
00154 #define CC2420_FIFOP_PIN          0
00155 /* P1.3 - Input: FIFO from CC2420 */
00156 #define CC2420_FIFO_PORT(type)     P1##type
00157 #define CC2420_FIFO_PIN            3
00158 /* P1.4 - Input: CCA from CC2420 */
00159 #define CC2420_CCA_PORT(type)      P1##type
00160 #define CC2420_CCA_PIN             4
00161 /* P4.1 - Input:  SFD from CC2420 */
00162 #define CC2420_SFD_PORT(type)      P4##type
00163 #define CC2420_SFD_PIN             1
00164 /* P4.2 - Output: SPI Chip Select (CS_N) */
00165 #define CC2420_CSN_PORT(type)      P4##type
00166 #define CC2420_CSN_PIN             2
00167 /* P4.5 - Output: VREG_EN to CC2420 */
00168 #define CC2420_VREG_PORT(type)     P4##type
00169 #define CC2420_VREG_PIN            5
00170 /* P4.6 - Output: RESET_N to CC2420 */
00171 #define CC2420_RESET_PORT(type)    P4##type
00172 #define CC2420_RESET_PIN           6
00173 
00174 #define CC2420_IRQ_VECTOR PORT1_VECTOR
00175 
00176 /* Pin status. */
00177 #define CC2420_FIFOP_IS_1 (!!(CC2420_FIFOP_PORT(IN) & BV(CC2420_FIFOP_PIN)))
00178 #define CC2420_FIFO_IS_1  (!!(CC2420_FIFO_PORT(IN) & BV(CC2420_FIFO_PIN)))
00179 #define CC2420_CCA_IS_1   (!!(CC2420_CCA_PORT(IN) & BV(CC2420_CCA_PIN)))
00180 #define CC2420_SFD_IS_1   (!!(CC2420_SFD_PORT(IN) & BV(CC2420_SFD_PIN)))
00181 
00182 /* The CC2420 reset pin. */
00183 #define SET_RESET_INACTIVE()   (CC2420_RESET_PORT(OUT) |=  BV(CC2420_RESET_PIN))
00184 #define SET_RESET_ACTIVE()     (CC2420_RESET_PORT(OUT) &= ~BV(CC2420_RESET_PIN))
00185 
00186 /* CC2420 voltage regulator enable pin. */
00187 #define SET_VREG_ACTIVE()       (CC2420_VREG_PORT(OUT) |=  BV(CC2420_VREG_PIN))
00188 #define SET_VREG_INACTIVE()     (CC2420_VREG_PORT(OUT) &= ~BV(CC2420_VREG_PIN))
00189 
00190 /* CC2420 rising edge trigger for external interrupt 0 (FIFOP). */
00191 #define CC2420_FIFOP_INT_INIT() do {                  \
00192     CC2420_FIFOP_PORT(IES) &= ~BV(CC2420_FIFOP_PIN);  \
00193     CC2420_CLEAR_FIFOP_INT();                         \
00194   } while(0)
00195 
00196 /* FIFOP on external interrupt 0. */
00197 #define CC2420_ENABLE_FIFOP_INT()  do {CC2420_FIFOP_PORT(IE) |= BV(CC2420_FIFOP_PIN);} while(0)
00198 #define CC2420_DISABLE_FIFOP_INT() do {CC2420_FIFOP_PORT(IE) &= ~BV(CC2420_FIFOP_PIN);} while(0)
00199 #define CC2420_CLEAR_FIFOP_INT()   do {CC2420_FIFOP_PORT(IFG) &= ~BV(CC2420_FIFOP_PIN);} while(0)
00200 
00201 /*
00202  * Enables/disables CC2420 access to the SPI bus (not the bus).
00203  * (Chip Select)
00204  */
00205 
00206  /* ENABLE CSn (active low) */
00207 #define CC2420_SPI_ENABLE()     (CC2420_CSN_PORT(OUT) &= ~BV(CC2420_CSN_PIN))
00208  /* DISABLE CSn (active low) */
00209 #define CC2420_SPI_DISABLE()    (CC2420_CSN_PORT(OUT) |=  BV(CC2420_CSN_PIN))
00210 #define CC2420_SPI_IS_ENABLED() ((CC2420_CSN_PORT(OUT) & BV(CC2420_CSN_PIN)) != BV(CC2420_CSN_PIN))
00211 
00212 #endif /* __PLATFORM_CONF_H__ */
